comments:
Discovered while testing patch for 209848.  

1) Create dynamic web app with JSF project, or import existing web project with the JSF facet.
2) Remove JSF facet
3) Re-add JSF facet.

NPE error msg occurs during checkbox selection.

This is not a blocker as it appears that the facet is still re-added.
